programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.sub-title: Hinckley: Diary of a Dangerous Mind
programme.desc: Recently uncovered pages from John Hinckley Jr.'s diary, which he began writing after he was arrested for trying to assassinate President Ronald Reagan; an interview with the officer who questioned Hinckley after the attempted assassination.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A professional poker player's gamble may have resulted in a murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After disappearing for a decade with a convict, officials question the deputy warden's wife's role in his escape.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When an Iowa woman is attacked while home alone with her three children, the confrontation turns deadly.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The residents of a glamorous resort town are shocked when a well-known woman from a prominent family is found dead in her home.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.sub-title: The Life and Death of Princess Diana
programme.desc: New insights into the real story of the very private royal, including a look at Diana's troubled marriage, her turbulent life in the royal family and the investigation into her death.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The five-year investigation into the death of a retired corrections officer, who was killed by antifreeze poisoning, reveals multiple suspects.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A father is accused of stealing money from his children's trust funds and murdering his ex-wife to cover up his crimes.

programme.desc: Authorities investigate the killing of a small-town fire chief.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man claims his young wife killed herself after she is found dead in her burning home.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The question of a surgeon's whereabouts remains unanswered for five years after he disappears while on vacation in the Greek Islands with his wife, leaving behind financial ruin and mounting malpractice suits from patients in the U.S.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Cara Ryan shoots her ex-husband and accuses him of threatening to kill her, police question her motive.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A Georgia couple's romantic tryst takes a deadly turn, leaving investigators stumped -- until tire treads at the scene and cell phone calls reveal a twisted plot.

programme.desc: When a woman is found murdered in her bed, her husband and her son accuse each other of being the killer.
